definition: Time Warner Inc., US media company
to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon
Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua
to receive/to accept/to enjoy/to bring into/to pay (tax etc)/nano- (one billionth)/to reinforce sole of shoes or stockings by close sewing

sentences.english: Time Warner is parent company of AOL.
sentences.chinese: 时代华纳是美国在线的母公司。

sentences.english: It also has broadcasting centers at Time Warner Center in New York City.
sentences.chinese: 它在在纽约时代华纳中心也有广播中心。

sentences.english: Redmond-based Microsoft and Time Warner's AOL unit have clashed in the past.
sentences.chinese: 过去，微软和时代华纳之间曾经冲突多次。

sentences.english: TWC -0.43% could now be in jeopardy.
sentences.chinese: 时代华纳现在处于危险的状态。

sentences.english: Time Warner also releases People magazine's digital version to any print subscriber.
sentences.chinese: 时代华纳还发布个人杂志的电子版给要打印的订阅者。

sentences.english: Talks also are under way with Sony ( SNE) and Warner Brothers.
sentences.chinese: 另外与索尼和时代华纳的谈判也再进行之中。

definition: Disney (company name, surname)/Walt Disney (1901-1966), American animator and film producer

definition: Disney (company name, surname)/also written 迪士尼[Di2 shi4 ni2]
